Package gw.api.policy

Class PolicyTypeUtil

java.lang.Object
gw.api.policy.PolicyTypeUtil
public class PolicyTypeUtil extends Object
Utility class for getting information about PolicyType.
Author:
efoley

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static LossType
    getLossTypeForPolicyType(PolicyType policyType)
    Gets the LossType for the given PolicyType from the business line configuration.
    static List
    getPolicyTypes(PolicySearchCriteria criteria)
    Gets from the business line configuration the allowable PolicyTypes for the LossType in the given PolicySearchCriteria.
    static Boolean
    hasInternalOnlyFields()
    Returns a Boolean indicating if the Policy entity definition contains internal-only fields.

  • Method Details

    • getPolicyTypes

      public static List getPolicyTypes(PolicySearchCriteria criteria)
      Gets from the business line configuration the allowable PolicyTypes for the LossType in the given PolicySearchCriteria.
      Parameters:
      criteria - the PolicySearchCriteria from which to get the LossType
      Returns:
      List of PolicyTypes allowed for the LossType.

    • getLossTypeForPolicyType

      public static LossType getLossTypeForPolicyType(PolicyType policyType)
      Gets the LossType for the given PolicyType from the business line configuration.
      Parameters:
      policyType - the PolicyType to get the LossType for.
      Returns:
      the LossType for the given PolicyType.

    • hasInternalOnlyFields

      public static Boolean hasInternalOnlyFields()
      Returns a Boolean indicating if the Policy entity definition contains internal-only fields.
      Returns:
      Boolean.TRUE if the Policy entity definition contains internal-only fields.
